page.title: 06ECOLOGY
page.content: The area around Rodley is not well looked after.The{Council}only comes occasionally to trim hedges.When it rains the footpaths and roads become muddy and flooded because of lack of drainage.Before the Council workers visit,the overgrowth gives an untidy appearance. The same situation applies to the south side where{residents}complain about the lack of Council workers present in the area.They may come{once {every six months}.In the past the area prided itself on being 'spick and span' and there was a permanent resident road worker.Residents feel Council workers must come more regularly if standards are to be improved but that will prove expensive.
